title: Tech Bytes: LTTS sets up Digital Twin practice; Tech Mahindra pact with Cisco for optical networking - The Financial Express
content: Tech Bytes: LTTS sets up Digital Twin practice; Tech Mahindra pact with Cisco for optical networking  The Financial Express
description: LTTS has collaborated with Microsoft and Bentley Systems to establish a centre of excellence (CoE) in Chennai that will address and accelerate the Digital Twin and Digital Thread requirements of new-age manufacturing companies.
